channel.title: Problems with 562 source complier
channel.description:
if you are having troubles with a 562 source look no further if you see a somthing like this
[code]@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling loginserver... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling packet handlers... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling logging system... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java echo Complete. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java echo Complete. pause[/code]
there is lots of stuff there but main stuff you may need to fix is the [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe[/code] what you may need to fix is this part[code]jdk2.6.0_26[/code] or this part[code]program files[/code] to [code]program files (x68)[/code]
then you run and it should work that only works with a assault x source if it dosnt work pm me so i can help
Thanks,king clay
P.S there are still tons more compliers that are out there nad ima help get them working

item.title: Problems with 562 source complier
item.dc:creator: @king_clay king clay
item.description:
@king_clay wrote:

if you are having troubles with a 562 source look no further if you see a somthing like this

@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling loginserver... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling packet handlers... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling logging system... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java echo Complete. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java echo Complete. pause

there is lots of stuff there but main stuff you may need to fix is the C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe
what you may need to fix is this partjdk2.6.0_26
or this partprogram files to program files (x68)

then you run and it should work that only works with a assault x source
if it dosnt work pm me so i can help

Thanks,king clay

P.S there are still tons more compliers that are out there nad ima help get them working
